org.openimaj.image.processing.face.similarity

Class FaceSimilarityEngine<D extends DetectedFace,F extends FacialFeature,I extends Image<?,I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.similarity.FaceSimilarityEngine<D,F,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - The type of DetectedFace
    F - the type of FacialFeature
    I - The type of Image

    public class FaceSimilarityEngine<D extends DetectedFace,F extends FacialFeature,I extends Image<?,I>>
extends Object
    The FaceSimilarityEngine allows computation of the similarity between faces in two images.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
